meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>grip</kanji> with your <kanji>hand</kanji> (onto another hand) is a <vocabulary>handshake</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. With 手 just think back to other vocab words that use the on'yomi reading.
